detaileddescription.para: gpio number for I2C master clock
gpio number for I2C master data
I2C port number for master dev
I2C master do not need buffer
I2C master do not need buffer
I2C master will check ack from slave
I2C master will not check ack from slave

briefdescription.para: Initialise the ESP32 I2C Driver in Master Mode.

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if I2C driver initialised properly, ESP_ERR_INVALID_ARG for Parameter error, ESP_FAIL Driver for install error

briefdescription.para: Initialise MPU-6050 (by sending the appropriate queued commands); Refer this for more information: https://invensense.tdk.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/MPU-6000-Datasheet1.pdf.

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if MPU-6050 initialised successfully, else the appropriate error code Refer this for more info on ESP32 I2C Error codes: https://docs.espressif.com/projects/esp-idf/en/latest/esp32/api-reference/peripherals/i2c.html

briefdescription.para: Get the accelerometer raw values (Ax, Ay, Az) into an 8-bit array Note that these raw values are actually 16-bit, split into MSB (Byte) and LSB (Byte), sent one after the other.

parameterdescription.para: Buffer array for storing raw values
Size of the buffer array (6 in our case)

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if acceleromter read successfully, else the appropriate error code

briefdescription.para: Get the gyroscope raw values (Gx, Gy, Gz) into an 8-bit array Note that these raw values are actually 16-bit, split into MSB (Byte) and LSB (Byte), sent one after the other.

parameterdescription.para: Buffer array for storing raw values
Size of the buffer array (6 in our case)

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if gyroscope read successfully, else the appropriate error code

briefdescription.para: Combine two 8-bit values to a 16-bit one Note that EVEN indices in the input buffer represent the MSB (Byte)

parameterdescription.para: 8-bit Input array of size 6
16-bit Output array of size 3

memberdef.argsstring: (int16_t ax, int16_t ay, int16_t az, float *acce_angle)
memberdef.name: compute_acce_angle

briefdescription.para: Compute the Euler angle (Pitch and Roll) from the accelerometer raw values Axes and Angles - X: Roll, Y: Pitch, Z: Yaw.

parameterdescription.para: Raw accelerometer value (X-axis)
Raw accelerometer value (Y-axis)
Raw accelerometer value (Z-axis)
Resultant angle array

memberdef.argsstring: (int16_t gx, int16_t gy, int16_t gz, float dt, float *gyro_angle)
memberdef.name: compute_gyro_angle

briefdescription.para: Compute the Euler angle (Pitch and Roll) from the gyroscope raw values Axes and Angles - X: Roll, Y: Pitch, Z: Yaw More on this here: https://philsal.co.uk/projects/imu-attitude-estimation.

parameterdescription.para: Raw gyroscope value (X-axis)
Raw gyroscope value (Y-axis)
Raw gyroscope value (Z-axis)
Sampling time for gyroscope readings (interval between 2 readings)
Resultant angle array

briefdescription.para: A wrapper for reading the 8-bit raw values from MPU and then combining them to their final form i.e. 16-bit.

parameterdescription.para: 16-bit array for storing the accelerometer raw values
16-bit array for storing the gyroscope raw values

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if successful, else the appropriate error code

briefdescription.para: Fuse the gyroscope and accelerometer angle in a complementary fashion More on this here: https://robotics.stackexchange.com/questions/10746/complimentary-filter-issues.

parameterdescription.para: Raw values from the accelerometer
Raw values from the gyroscope
Resultant fused and filtered angle
Offset of the MPU (accelerometer) at rest position

briefdescription.para: The ultimate function (application ready); takes in the input raw values and initial conditions and gives out the complementary pitch and roll angles.

parameterdescription.para: Input array of angles to store the results in (passed by reference)
Initial conditions for the accelerometer and gyroscope (Angle at rest position)

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if successful, else the appropriate error code

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the MPU offset for raw values.

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if successful, else ESP_FAIL

briefdescription.para: Helper function for the function calibrate_mpu6050() to calculate the average of the raw values.

parameterdescription.para: Input array of accelerometer raw values (passed by reference) to be filled by the function.
Input array of gyroscope raw values (passed by reference) to be filled by the function.
Offset to be applied to the accelerometer raw values.
Offset to be applied to the gyroscope raw values.

simplesect.para: esp_err_t returns ESP_OK if successful, else ESP_FAIL
